name: TB4: Western Frontier
description:
TB4 Western Frontier.  My TB4 series is a way to peek inside the Assets in a multiplayer environment to see whether you will love them or not before you buy them.  Think of them as a Try Before you Buy.  

This does use the Steam subsystems so you only need to have steam running in the background.  To join or have others join your multiplayer session you all need to have steam running in the background and be in the same steam region.
